dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
This isthe Temple of the Ancients{PAUSE}II know
I feel it
The knowledge of the Ancientsfloating

{Aeris}
You could become one with the Planet,
but you're stopping it
with the strength of will.{PAUSE}For the future?
For us?

{Cloud}
What are you saying?
Do you understand?

Because I'm here?
I'm sorryI don't understand.

{Barret}
It says number 9.
He has a tattoo on his neck.

{Yuffie}
He has a tattoo too!
Ummm, I think it's number 9.

{Cid}
Hey, he's got a tattoo.
It says number 9.
